title: High Half-Elf
content:
ke: Divine a character's defences to give you advantage on attack rolls against it.

Acid Splash: Hurl a bubble of acid that deals 1d6 Acid to each creature it hits. Blade Ward: Gain resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from weapon attacks. Bone Chill: Assail a creature with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic and cannot regain hit points. Undead creatures also get disadvantage on attack rolls. Dancing Lights: Create wisps of light that illuminate a 12m radius. Fire
